title: The Blue - Part 4
description: Tanner has reached the safe haven of Plane Floe. It seems like there is everything her and Voley could want--shelter, warmth, and even the potential for food...  Facing starvation, and the last bits of the veneer Russell clung to, what can Tanner do to survive? And will the floe really last long with the widening fissures in the ice?
author: Joseph A. Turkot
